result.execSummary:
The defendant Pedro Josue Pena was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operate with Restricted Controlled Substance (2nd), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(am).
  • Endangering Safety by use of Dangerous Weapon While Intoxicated, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.20(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Pay a fine of $350.00 plus all costs, penalties and surcharges commencing 01-01-16 at the rate of $100.00 per month or, as a penalty if not paid, convert to a civil judgment. Cash bail applied
Any vehicle owned/operated by the defendant
STRAIGHT TIME; with credit for 2 days served. Sentence STAYED until 10-29-15 by 5pm
Pay all costs and surcharges after the costs and surcharges are paid in Count 1 at the rate of $100.00 per month or, as a penalty if not paid, convert to a civil judgment.
Concurrent with: Count 1; STRAIGHT TIME, with credit for 2 days served

charges.descr: Endangering Safety by use of Dangerous Weapon While Intoxicated

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Pedro Josue Pena

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: 2/3/16 DOR tax intercept of $4.00 originally applied on case no. 10CT2189 will be applied towards costs on case no. 15CM1936.

Defendant Pedro Josue Pena in court with attorney Michael J Steinle.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Statements by each counsel and defendant as to sentencing.  

AS TO COUNT 1:  Court sentenced defendant to serve 110 DAYS in the House of Correction; STRAIGHT TIME; with credit for 2 days served; sentence stayed until October 29, 2015 by 5:00 pm.

Court sentenced defendant to pay a FINE of $350.00  PLUS all costs, penalties and surcharges commencing January 1, 2016 at the rate of $100.00 per month or, as a penalty if not paid, convert to a civil judgment; cash bail on deposit to be applied.

Court ordered Intoxicated Driver Assessment; form filed; copy to defendant.
Court ordered defendant's driving privileges revoked for 12 months.
Court ordered any vehicle owned/operated by the defendant to be equipped with the Ignition Interlock Device for 12 months and pay the IID surcharge.

AS TO COUNT 2:  Court sentenced defendant to serve 110 DAYS in the House of Correction CONCURRENT to COUNT 1; STRAIGHT TIME; with credit for 2 days served.

Court ordered defendant to pay ALL COSTS and SURCHARGES after the costs and surcharges are paid in COUNT 1 at the rate of $100.00 per month or, as a penalty if not paid, convert to a civil judgment.
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief received and filed.

Defendant Pedro Josue Pena in court with attorney Michael J Steinle.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.

AS TO BOTH COUNTS:  Defendant changes his plea to GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty.   Defendant advised that if not a United States Citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found that defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea.  Court found defendant guilty and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.  Court ordered case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 24.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for October 26, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Pedro Josue Pena in court with attorney Michael J Steinle.  Kimberly Dorice Schoepp appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 24.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 21, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered the remaining cash bail to be returned to the remitter.
Absolute Sobriety.
Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription and no dangerous weapons or firearms.
No driving without a valid license.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Pedro Josue Pena in court with Adam C. Essling for attorney Michael J Steinle.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to Defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 24.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 27, 2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Pedro Josue Pena
Current: 3834 S 37th Street, Greenfield, WI 53221   (Effective: 07-10-2015)
Prior: 3746 East Squire Avenue, Cudahy, WI 53110
SUMMONS MAILED. DEFENDANT ORDERED INTO ROOM 221 SAFETY BUILDING ON 7/10/15 @ 1:30 pm
